description: He is the main protagonist who goes by the name "Nezumi Kozo" at night, fighting against the injustices done to the townspeople. By day he is known as Mr. Helper, who does a myriad of odd jobs around town. He`s not very good with money, since he will squander all his pay in gambling at the end of the day, which is why his sister Koharu doesn`t trust him to run her decorative chopstick shop for fear that he may use the shop`s earnings to finance his gambling habit.
name: Roman
